entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as round-shouldered yet angular, with oily hair swinging about his face. He is seen moving between tables towards the doors into the entrance hall, still absorbed in his own examination paper.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking down at his father and then standing waiting for Sirius to join him. He is seen glimpsing Snape a short way away and trying to keep him in sight while straining his ears to catch the voices of James and his friends.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as being separated from Snape by a gang of chattering girls. He is seen talking with Sirius and Lupin in the entrance hall.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as emerging into the entrance hall with Harry and Lupin. He asks James if he liked question ten.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as talking with Sirius and James in the entrance hall. He says he loved question ten.

relationships.description: Harry tries to keep Snape in sight while straining his ears to catch the voices of James and his friends.
James is seen talking with Sirius in the entrance hall.
Sirius and Lupin are mentioned as talking together in the entrance hall.
